# Rhino's Rush (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]], [[Wrath (Domain)|Wrath]] 1

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 176

*A violent fury consumes you. You seek nothing more than to charge at your enemies and bash in their heads.*

This spell allows you to propel yourself in a single deadly charge. The first charge attack you make before the end of the round deals double damage on a successful hit.
